description: Number of partitions of n where product of parts divides n.
comments: a(n) depends only on prime signature of n (cf. A025487). So a(24) = a(375) since 24=2^3*3 and 375=3*5^3 both have prime signature (3,1). - _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 03 2005
formula: Sum_{ d divides n } A001055(d). - _Vladeta Jovovic_
author: _Leroy Quet_, Oct 04 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Oct 09 2000; and from _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 19 2000
